title: I vote we nerf Kat's passive
body:
Seriously, 15 seconds off all abilities cooldowns? none of them even have 15 seconds, also I know you KAtarina mains, "OMG just get good you %%%got her passive's not the problem, you just suck!"

trust me, if anything make it that her cooldowns are reduced by 25%-50% upon kills or assists, I mean it's far more reasonable then pretty much URF for one champ.

replies.body:
Sure, you can nerf the passive.

Then triple the scaling on her W and E, cut her basic ability cooldowns by 1/3, and make Death Lotus cc immune.

its already been hard nerfed to only count for damage in the last 3 seconds rather than last ~13


are we seriously complaining about katarina here?

> [{quoted}](name=King of Mongoose,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u1AagRpx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-31T15:41:53.159+0000)

>

> are we seriously complaining about katarina here?

I think her kit's fine for the most part, just the passive needs to change, I mean 50% reduction upon kills/assists is balanced, because she's a burst champ.

anything that doesn't hard reset at least her basic abilities will dumpster her

her abilities by themselves suck. when they are reset and repeated then the damage adds up and she becomes lethal to an entire team.

Her passive is "reset all her basic abilities and take 15 seconds off her ultimate".  That's always been the idea of it.
It used to even say that explicitly at one point, just after her rework: "Champion kills or assists reduce Death Lotus's cooldown by 10 seconds and refresh basic abilities. "
kat is a reset assassin. getting rid of the reset mechanic is probably the worst Idea i have seen on the boards.
Although it is bad, you sir do not peruse the boards enough.

sure it does

You don't understand how the champion is supposed to work if you are making this suggestion. The purpose of her reset is that if she kills a target she can go to the next one. Reducing her CD by 50%, even 70% if you want, is as good as 0%. If she cannot jump to her next target or back to safety right after killing her first target, she's as good as dead. Her resets are not supposed to give her more uptime, they are supposed to let her chain shunpos, and potentially kills.
They already did, used to reset on kill or assist.
